name: V2CSRelationshipType
title: v2CS-relationshipType
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts that identify the type of relationship identified by Relationship Instance Identifier (REL-3) that is established between the Source Information Instance (REL-4)  and the Target Information Instance (REL-5).
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0948 (Relationship Type)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.definition: Source universal service identifier causes/caused the outcome(s) on the target
Target universal service identifier is a component of source universal identifier

property.valueString: Example: one care plan activity (target) is a component of another care plan activity (source)

concept.definition: Source and target universal service identifier should start concurrently

property.valueString: Example: two care plan activities should start concurrently

concept.definition: Source universal service identifier provides evidence for target universal service identifier

property.valueString: Example: observation result provides evidence for certain care plan activity or treatment action

concept.definition: Source universal service identifier interferes / interfered with fulfilment of target universal service identifier

property.valueString: Example: patient financial or physical constraints interferes / interfered with fulfilment of goal

concept.definition: Source universal service identifier limits/limited the fulfillment of target universal service identifier

property.valueString: Example: patient condition limits the extend that planned treatment can be implemented

concept.definition: Target universal service identifier should succeed (starts after end of) source universal service identifier

property.valueString: Example: one care plan activity (target) should start after completion of another (source)

concept.definition: Target universal service identifier is the object of the service identified by the source universal service identifier

property.valueString: Example: An order requests clarification or interpretation of a previous clinical laboratory test result

concept.definition: Source universal service identifier triggers action of target universal service identifier

property.valueString: Example: a bleeding complication triggers the review and change in anti-coagulant dosage
